name: Ultimate Custom Night
description: Welcome to the ultimate FNAF mashup, featuring 50 selectable characters and custom difficulties!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP, 7, 8, Vista, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win XP, 7, 8, Vista, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 500 MB available space
